excludedItems: Ticket fares for infants and children

redemptionMethod.details: Use promo code INICI24 to avail discount on Emirates website.
redemptionMethod.eligibilityCriteria: Emirates Skywards ICICI Bank Credit Cardholders

rewards.rewardDescription: Discount on base airfare for Emirates Skywards ICICI Bank Credit Cardholders for flight bookings made on Emirates website using promo code INICI24. Valid for bookings by Sept 30, 2025 and travels from India. Not applicable on special fares, interline flights (except EK /FZ), and ticket fares for infants and children. Subject to availability and cannot be clubbed with other offers. Fuel surcharges, applicable government and airport taxes and levies are not discounted.
